categories: Category:Learn to Read with Star Wars

nodes.text: Learn to Read with Star Wars: Darth Vader Level 3

Learn to Read with Star Wars: Darth Vader Level 3 is a box set collecting four Level 3 young-readers titles in the DK Readers series. The collected books include Star Wars: Star Pilot (Laura Buller), Star Wars: The Story of Darth Vader (Catherine Saunders), Death Star Battles (Simon Beecroft), and Battle for Naboo (Lisa Stock). It was published by DK Publishing on December 12, 2017, and was available exclusively through retailer Barnes & Noble.
